From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To create Pulse Code Modulation (PCM) capture profiles, use the **monitor pcm-tracer profile** command in global configuration mode. To disable the configuration, use the **no** form of this command.

ParaDef.Info: Profile number. The range is from 1 to 10.

Examples: The following example shows how to create a PCM capture profile with profile number 1:
ExtraInfo: You must create at least one user profile under the channels that need to be traced. You can create the following profile operations:•![](/c/dam/en/us/td/i/templates/blank.gif)Create a user profile identified by a profile number.•![](/c/dam/en/us/td/i/templates/blank.gif)Add one or more profiles. A user profile consists of capture groups in which the channels that are to be traced are specified.•![](/c/dam/en/us/td/i/templates/blank.gif)Configure one or more capture groups under a profile.
